SEARCH
Package Model.StateModels

Class Partita

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.StateModels.Stato
Model.StateModels.Partita
public class Partita extends Stato
This class manages the mechanics of the game and all the entities that take part in it. The Player, the Levels and the Win and GameOver states are associated with the game as they can only occur while a game is being played.
See Also:
